Articles.Content: Hi guys, I am in a big trouble with maneuver nodes. When I lunch a rocket and press M for the "map of Kerbin" I can only see my grey trajectory without AP and PE. I also don't see the little (SAS on) icons on the left side of gimball/gyroscope like the prograde and retrograde. So I'm asking, what do I have to change to see them?

Are you playing KSP1 in career mode? If so, you will need to upgrade the tracking station before you get all the course projection indicators. And the SAS modes will be dependent on what kind of probe core you're using and whether or not you're in contact with KSC by antenna.
